post:
InterServer Offers Ryzen 3600X Dedis (64GB RAM + Dual NVMe Drives) in New Jersey!

interserver, interserver.net, new jersey, ryzen May 2, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

InterServer contacted us to share an exciting Ryzen 3600X dedi offer.  A few weeks ago we interviewed Mike Larvik, their Director of Business Development.  They’ve been in the industry for over 22 years and have an adorable dog on their team.

The Ryzen 3600X is a pretty fast chip!  Lots of CPU-intensive tasks and applications that would love this kind of horsepower.  These servers come with dual NVMe hard drives – very nice! – as well as 20TB of bandwidth!

Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept a wide variety of payment methods.

Here’s a little about InterServer in their own words:

“While times may change, our commitment to our customers never waivers!

For the last 22 years, our team has been committed to helping you drive your business and reach your goals. Although technology has changed from the time we started in 1999, our core principles of quality, service, and support have remained the same. Our company has evolved its product offering to include Shared Hosting, Cloud Hosting, Quick Servers, and Dedicated Servers along with colocation services to continue to exceed our customers’ expectations and remain BEST IN CLASS.

As a leading web hosting provider, InterServer can provide its extensive customer base with innovative products and services designed to complement their existing businesses. We service customers ranging from individual freelancers to Fortune 500 companies, both domestic and international. InterServer takes tremendous pride in our commitment to ensure security, reliability, and technical expertise to each customer. We are one of the few service providers that offer around-the-clock customer support with live representatives available 24/7.”

If you have been a customer of InterServer or you give them a try out now, please comment below.

Now read more to see the offer!

AMD RYZEN 3600X

  • 6 Core Single CPU
  • 64GB Memory
  • 2 x 1TB NVME
  • 20TB Transfer
  • 5 IPS
  • $91 per month
  • [ORDER]

NETWORK INFO:

  • DATACENTER: Secaucus NJ (TEB2, TEB4 or TEB5)
  • Test IP: 69.10.46.218
  • Test file: http://speedtest.is.cc/5G.img
  • More DC info on their website
Please let us know if you have any questions/comments and enjoy!
